announcements.headline: Gravity Studios grand opening event!
GRAVITY STUDIOS@ GMAC !
announcements.body: Gravity Studios is now open offering Step, Barre, Pole Fitness, TRX and personal training! Find schedule and information on Facebook at Gravity Studios @ GMAC or Tracy Waites Fitness.
